##  Description 

{{Description |{{#var:description}}}}

##  Acquisition 

{{#arraymap: {{#var:location}}|;|x|x|\n}}

## Usage

* You can jokingly (or cruelly) hand this to back [Rinco](/rinco/), with a number of resulting dialogue options.
* Discard it from the description page.
